resume_text:
NAME: Anya Sharma
EMAIL: anya.sharma@email.com
PHONE: (555) 444-5555

SUMMARY:
Highly adaptable Cloud Architect with extensive experience in designing, deploying, and managing cloud-based solutions. Expertise in AWS, Azure, and GCP, along with a deep understanding of cloud security best practices.

SKILLS:
AWS, Azure, GCP, Terraform, Kubernetes, Docker, Python, CloudFormation

EXPERIENCE:
Cloud Architects Ltd. - Cloud Architect (2018 - Present)
- Designed and implemented cloud infrastructure solutions for enterprise clients using AWS, Azure, and GCP.
- Automated infrastructure provisioning and deployment using Terraform and CloudFormation.

IT Infrastructure Services - Systems Administrator (2016 - 2018)
- Managed and maintained on-premises servers and infrastructure.
- Migrated applications to the cloud.

EDUCATION:
University of Southern California - Master's in Computer Science (2016)

CERTIFICATIONS:
AWS Certified Solutions Architect, Microsoft Azure Administrator, Google Cloud Professional
